text: Lubomír Lipský (April 19, 1923 - October 2, 2015) was a Czech actor. He was known for his roles in Four Murders Are Enough, Darling, Grapes, and in Six Bears and a Clown. He was born in Pelhřimov. His brother was director Oldřich Lipský. He died in Prague, aged 92. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1923 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Czech movie actors Category:Czech television actors
title: Lubomír Lipský
